notes.text:
This was simultaneously the easiest and hardest season so far for me.
TLDR: tried a bunch of decks and struggled, finally got Queen yesterday and KOG was ez
154 victories total
- Started season without a completed decklist on the tierlist
- Tried Geargias -> lackluster with only 1 ToTB
- Wanted to jump on Amazoness hype train but Mai was only lvl 36, thus the grind began
- Tricky OTK -> L2, very fun, decently strong but so difficult to draw the right hand 5 games in a row 
- Bunch of random meme decks here and there
- CA OTK -> similar to tricky, winstreaks to L2 with imminent loss streaks back to L1
- SB -> Copped so many losses trying to learn this deck, got to L3, then tilted to L1, this deck was difficult to play and not enjoyable for me
- Paleos -> tried a deck that got posted here whilst I closed out the grind to get Queen, this deck was really fun and strong against amazoness which was nice, going to try take this deck to KOG next month
- Amazoness -> Finally got my Queen and in (roughly) 20 wins and 4 losses I went from L1 to KOG, quite frankly this was the easiest KOG for me so far although this might be because of how late in the season it was.
